name: Infinite Scroll for P2
author: Kyle Scheuerlein

sections.description: Add support to the P2 theme for Jetpack Infinite Scroll. This will also automatically hide the default “Older posts” link in place of the infinite scroll button (for visitors that have JavaScript enabled).
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
It won’t work

This plugin adds support for Jetpack Infinite Scroll. You’ll need to have Jetpack installed, and the Infinite Scroll module enabled. Finally, you’ll need to configure it in Settings>Reading.

Does this work for other themes?

Probably not. It’s designed for P2 and any P2 child themes.
